rooms.description: An inviting entrance space that aligns with Vastu principles of positive energy flow. The entrance is positioned facing east for auspicious beginnings.
A spacious living area that merges indoor and outdoor space with large Mediterranean-style windows. Vastu alignment ensures the north direction is prominent, inviting prosperity.
An airy dining area adjacent to the living room with proper Vastu alignment for east-west axis promoting balance and clarity.

A dedicated, well-lit home office in a quiet corner of the ground floor. This room features Mediterranean design elements and complies with Vastu by having its door facing north to channel focus and success.

openings.description: Vastu-aligned entrance facing east, ensuring positive energy flow into the home. The main entrance is wide enough for vehicles while maintaining a secure environment.
Large windows across living and dining areas ensure ample natural light; all openings are oriented according to Vastu guidelines.

notes: The plot orientation is considered with the main entrance facing east for auspicious beginnings.
Living spaces have been oriented towards the north and west to promote balance as per Vastu principles.
The home office is placed in a quiet area to maximize productivity, aligned with Vastu recommendations.
